name: Order of the Profane Soul
source: Critical Role / Explorer's Guide to Wildemount
description: Blood Hunters of the Order of the Profane Soul bind their hemocraft to an otherworldly patron, blending martial prowess with pact magic and eldritch invocations.

3.name: Otherworldly Patron
3.description: You form a pact with an otherworldly patron that grants you expanded spells and unique features.

3.name: Pact Magic
3.description: You gain limited pact spellcasting, using Wisdom as your spellcasting ability. Pact spell slots recharge on a short rest.

7.name: Eldritch Invocations
7.description: You learn eldritch invocations that enhance your pact magic.

11.name: Mystic Frenzy
11.description: When you take the Attack action, you can replace one of your attacks with the casting of a cantrip.

15.name: Brand of the Sapped
15.description: Your Brand of Castigation weakens your branded foe, reducing the damage it deals to you.

18.name: Soul Siphon
18.description: When you reduce a hostile creature to 0 hit points, you can regain a pact spell slot.
